login.pinDescription: Enter the 6 digit code sent to your email

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Set your profile avatar and username. You can also change your password here.

avatar.heading: Profile Avatar

confirmModal.heading: Delete Avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your avatar?

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, AVIF, SVG. Max size: 10MB.

avatar.errorRemoveMessage: An error occurred while removing your avatar

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

email.heading: Email
email.emailDescription: This is your email address. Enter your new email address to update your account.
email.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your email

password.heading: Password
password.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your password

enable.heading: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
enable.qrInstruction: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
enable.errorMessage: An error occurred while enabling two-factor authentication
enable.codeDescription: This is the code to enable two-factor authentication.

disable.heading: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.message: After disabling two-factor authentication, you will not be able to login with your email and password. You will need to login with your email and the code sent to your email.
disable.errorMessage: An error occurred while disabling two-factor authentication

confirmModal.heading: Deactivate Account
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? You will not be able to login with your email and password. You will need to login with your email and the code sent to your email.
confirmModal.errorMessage: An error occurred while deactivating your account

theme.heading: Theme
theme.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the theme

language.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the language

notifications.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the notifications settings

confirmModal.heading: Delete Session
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

sessionItem.errorDeleteMessage: An error occurred while deleting the session

instructionModal.heading: Stream Keys
instructionModal.description: Follow OBS studio instructions to start streaming.
instructionModal.step1Description: Download OBS Studio from the official website. You should get server url and stream key for streaming.
instructionModal.downloadOBSDescription: Download OBS Studio from the official website. You should get server url and stream key for streaming.
instructionModal.copyKeys: Copy server url and stream key
instructionModal.copyKeysDescription: After generation you will see two fileds: server url and stream key. Copy them and paste them into OBS Studio.
instructionModal.step2Description: Open OBS Studio and go to the settings.
instructionModal.openOBSDescription: Open OBS Studio and go to the settings.
instructionModal.openStreamSettingsDescription: Go to the stream settings and File => Settings => Stream
instructionModal.enterDetailsDescription: In the Service field select Custom and enter the server url and stream key.
instructionModal.saveSettingsDescription: Save the settings and go to the next step.
instructionModal.step3Description: After successfully saving the settings, you can start streaming.
instructionModal.startStreamingDescription: Start streaming and enjoy your stream. Click on the start streaming button and enjoy your stream.
instructionModal.monitorStreamingDescription: Monitor your streaming and enjoy your stream. Click on the monitor streaming button and enjoy your stream.
instructionModal.congratulations: Congratulations! Now you can start streaming. Your followers will be able to watch your stream.

createModal.heading: Create Stream Key
createModal.ingressTypeDescription: Select the ingress type for your stream key. RTMP is the most common type and is supported by most streaming platforms or you can use WHIP.
createModal.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating the stream key

isChatFollowersOnly.heading: Chat Followers Only
isChatFollowersOnly.description: Enable or disable chat for followers only

isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.heading: Chat Premium Followers Only
isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.description: Enable or disable chat for premium followers only

chat.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the chat settings

alert.heading: Need channel verification
alert.description: You need to verify your channel to start sponsoring. Please contact support to verify your channel.
